sentence.Network_en: The flat lands grow rapeseed and wheat.
sentence.Network_cn: 平坦的土地种植油菜籽和小麦.

sentence.Network_en: We can easily raise plenty of corn and rapeseed in the fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们很容易在田间收获大量谷类及油菜子.

sentence.Network_en: Prices of other crops including barley, corn and rapeseed, also jumped sharply.
sentence.Network_cn: 大麦 、 玉米和油菜籽等其它农产品价格也大幅上涨.
